text: Arrā ni chikadzukou to, kare-ra ga kare o sashioite kami to shite hai shita mono-tachi wa, naze kare-ra o tasukenakatta no ka. Iya (tasukerudokoroka) gūzō wa kare-ra kara sugata o keshite shimatta. Kore wa,(gūzō o agameru kare-ra no ronri) kare-ra no gisakudeari, mata netsuzō shita monodeatta
